meanings.definition: The bloom or blossom of a plant.
meanings.sent1: The colorful flowers brightened up the garden.
meanings.sent2: She picked a bouquet of beautiful flowers for her mother.
meanings.sent3: The flowers seemed to be dancing in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a flower in the morning sun.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the flowers filled the room with sweetness.

meanings.definition: A plant cultivated for its blooms.
meanings.sent1: The florist grew various flowers in her greenhouse.
meanings.sent2: The gardeners planted rows of flowers along the path.
meanings.sent3: The flowers in the garden whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity blossomed like a well-tended flower.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the flowers painted a beautiful picture.

meanings.definition: The state or time of flowering.
meanings.sent1: Spring is the season when flowers bloom everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The park was filled with the sights and scents of flowers in full bloom.
meanings.sent3: The flowers in the meadow were having a party, blooming all night long.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness blossomed like a field of wildflowers in the sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The flowers of her joy spread their petals wide for all to see.
